channel.title: CVE Feed for makedeb -- mist
channel.description: The latest CVEs for makedeb -- mist

item.title: CVE-2022-39245|2024-08-03T12:00:43.656Z -- makedeb -- mist
item.description: Mist is the command-line interface for the makedeb Package Repository. Prior to version 0.9.5, a user-provided `sudo` binary via the `PATH` variable can allow a local user to run arbitrary commands on the user's system with root permissions. Versions 0.9.5 and later contain a patch. No known workarounds exist.
